alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 4:18AM CDT until October 29 at 12:08AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River Near Galesville affecting La Crosse and Trempealeau Counties. Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 47.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 43.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 38.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. this afternoon at 430 PM CDT.
